mapper.insert: insert into utxo_input (tx_hash, in_index, from_hash, from_index, sign) values (#{txHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fromHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fromIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sign,jdbcType=VARBINARY})

insert into utxo_input (tx_hash, in_index, from_hash, from_index, sign) values
( #{item.txHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.inIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{item.fromHash,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.fromIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.sign,jdbcType=VARBINARY})
